channel.title: Elumination - RsPs Of The Future
channel.description:
[font=impact][size=18pt]Hello Moparscape[/size][/font] Hello Moparscape my name is Austin and i am currently the creator of Elumination. I've had multiple servers not currently as advanced as this one. I am hoping to do a couple things. I want to make a stable economy, I also want to have a server not for the money but for the enjoyment of just owning a server. I am going to be developing most of the work but will need one persons help. I need someone that is trust worth and willing to help this server grow not just player wise but content wise. I also hope to gain more knowledge of java while working on this project.
[font=impact][size=18pt]Application Format:[/size][/font] [code]First and Last Name:
Date of Birth:
Time Zone:
Past experience in working with Private Servers:
Past experience with RuneScape Private Servers:
Which Languages other than Java do you know:
Examples of your work:
Can you Develop Client-sided content as well:
Other than Private Server Development, please list your capabilities:
How do you wish to be compensated:
How can we contact you:[/code]
[font=impact][size=18pt]Content Developers:[/size][/font] [ul][li]Austin[/li] [li]N/A[/li][/ul]
[font=impact][size=18pt]Server Developers:[/size][/font] [ul][li]Austin[/li] [li]N/A[/li][/ul]
[font=impact][size=18pt]Client Developers:[/size][/font] [ul][li]Austin[/li] [li]N/A[/li][/ul]
[font=impact][size=18pt]Legacy:[/size][/font]
[ul][li]Green - completed[/li] [li]Yellow - started[/li] [li]Red - not starter/completed[/li][/ul]
[font=impact][size=18pt][img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122084602/runescape/images/5/51/Attack-icon.png[/img]Combat:[/SIZE][/FONT]
[ul][li][size=9pt][color=green]Working special attacks[/COLOR][/SIZE][/li] [li][size=9pt][color=green]Multi Combat Areas[/COLOR][/SIZE][/li] [li][size=9pt][color=green]99% Accurate Defence Formula[/COLOR][/SIZE][/li] [li][size=9pt][color=green]99% Accurate Accuracy Formula[/COLOR][/SIZE][/li] [li][size=9pt][color=green]Cannot attack npcs or players through walls[/COLOR][/SIZE][/li] [li][size=9pt][color=green]Clipped Combat Following[/COLOR][/SIZE][/li] [li][size=9pt][color=green]99% Accurate Maximum Magic Damage Formula[/COLOR][/SIZE][/li] [li][size=9pt][color=green]99% Accurate Maximum Melee Damage Formula[/COLOR][/SIZE][/li] [li][size=9pt][color=green]99% Accurate Maximum Range Damage Formula[/COLOR][/SIZE][/li] [li][size=9pt][color=green]100% Accurate Weapon/Armor Bonuses[/COLOR][/SIZE][/li][/ul]
[font=impact][size=18pt][img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120121214504/runescape/images/6/6d/Firemaking-icon.png[/img]Firemaking:[/SIZE][/FONT]
[ul][li][size=9pt][color=green]All Obtainable Logs[/COLOR][/SIZE][/li] [li][size=9pt][color=green]Colored Fires[/COLOR][/SIZE][/li] [li][size=9pt][color=green]Clipped[/COLOR][/SIZE][/li] [li][size=9pt][color=green]Re-written[/COLOR][/SIZE][/li][/ul]
[font=impact][size=18pt][img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120123002212/runescape/images/0/0b/Fishing-icon.png[/img]Fishing:[/SIZE][/FONT]
[ul][li][size=9pt][color=green]Fishing Guild[/COLOR][/SIZE][/li] [li][size=9pt][color=green]Random Events[/COLOR][/SIZE][/li] [li][size=9pt][color=green]Catching Fish[/COLOR][/SIZE][/li] [li][size=9pt][color=green]Fishing Gear[/COLOR][/SIZE][/li] [li][size=9pt][color=green]Re-written[/COLOR][/SIZE][/li][/ul]
[center][font=impact][size=18pt]Pictures:[/size][/font] [IMG]http://i1125.photobucket.com/albums/l594/stnbarton12/1-20.png[/img][IMG]http://i1125.photobucket.com/albums/l594/stnbarton12/6-10.png[/img][IMG]http://i1125.photobucket.com/albums/l594/stnbarton12/7-10.png[/img][IMG]http://i1125.photobucket.com/albums/l594/stnbarton12/9-8.png[/img][IMG]http://i1125.photobucket.com/albums/l594/stnbarton12/5-11.png[/img][IMG]http://i1125.photobucket.com/albums/l594/stnbarton12/2-18.png[/img][IMG]http://i1125.photobucket.com/albums/l594/stnbarton12/3-18.png[/img][IMG]http://i1125.photobucket.com/albums/l594/stnbarton12/4-16.png[/img][/center]
